content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skuName') ASâ€¯skuName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationId') AS reservationId,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.usageDate') AS usageDate,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.totalReservedQuantity') AS totalReservedQuantity,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservedHours') AS reservedHours,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.usedHours') AS usedHours
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/validation/2022/02/02/costreport_reservation_details_validation.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '\',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '},'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent nvarchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
